TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit GeometryHitTestResult extends System.Windows.Media.HitTestResult

summary.span: 傳回使用 作為點擊測試參數的點擊測試結果。

span.span: Returns the results of a hit test that uses a as a hit test parameter.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您也可以執行點擊的測試視覺化的物件上使用作為點擊測試參數，並傳回結果做為。You can also perform a hit test on a visual object by using a as a hit test parameter, and return the result as a .

span.span: The visual object that is hit during a hit test.

param.name: intersectionDetail
param.span: 描述 與 visualHit 的交集。

summary.span: 使用指定的視覺物件和 值，初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class by using a specified visual object and value.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property IntersectionDetail As IntersectionDetail

summary.span: 取得點擊測試的 值。

span.span: Gets the value of the hit test.
The value of the hit test.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性描述之間的交集與目標視覺物件。The property describes the intersection between a and the target visual object. 下圖顯示之點擊的測試的幾何 （藍色圓形） 和目標物件 （紅色方格） 之間的關聯性。The following illustration shows the relationship between the hit test geometry (the blue circle) and the target object (the red square). ![圖表中使用之 IntersectionDetail 的點擊測試](~/add/media/intersectiondetail01.png "圖表的 IntersectionDetail 在點擊測試")![Diagram of IntersectionDetail used in hit testing](~/add/media/intersectiondetail01.png "Diagram of IntersectionDetail used in hit testing") 點擊的測試幾何與目標物件之間交集The intersection between a hit test geometry and a target object ## Examples 下列範例示範如何使用屬性。The following example shows how to use the property of .
